com.example.treasurehunt

Class CameraActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.example.treasurehunt.CameraActivity

  • public class CameraActivity
extends Activity

    MMNET Team 04

    Project Title: Treasure Hunt

    Class Description: Activity called by the user that hides the treasure. Make use of the OpenCV camera preview. It uses Android Camera in order to take focused pictures.

      • onCameraFrame

        public Mat onCameraFrame(CvCameraViewFrame inputFrame)
        This method is used in order to compute and show in real time the features of the scene. It is useful to the user in order to understand whether the treasure has a sufficient number of features or not.
        Parameters:
        inputFrame - it is the current displayed camera preview
        Returns:
        rgba Mat containing the current preview + the computed features

        myContext -

      • onSensorChanged

        public void onSensorChanged(SensorEvent event)
        This method is used in order to understand the current device rotation
        Parameters:
        event - an event on the accelerometer sensor
